install.name: Content - Creative Commons Tagger
install.author: Mark A. Taff
install.description: Applies a creative commons license to articles. Simply add a tag like {cc-gpl-3} to an article. Available tags are: cc-by, cc-by-sa, cc-by-nd, cc-by-nc, cc-by-nc-sa, cc-by-nc-nd, cc-pd, cc-gpl-2, cc-gpl-3, cc-lgpl, cc-bsd, and cc-reserved.

param.name: permissions
param.label: Permissions URL
param.description: Set the URL people should use to request premissions beyond what the license gives them. DO NOT use an email address here if you have Joomla set up to obfuscate email addresses!
